In England, in the seven days to 08 May, there were 12,421 new confirmed cases (22.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 May, there were 12,788 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (367 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 May is 3,882,574 (6,897.8 cases per 100,000 population).
